queryMap.query: SELECT /* rsm1120_s02 */ A.EVENT_DT ,A.MIN_SLIP_SEQ ,A.EVENT_TM ,A.COMM_NO ,B.CD_NM AS COMM_NM ,A.PLACE_NO ,A.PLACE_NM ,A.CARD_NO ,A.CARD_SEQ ,A.MEET_CD ,A.MIN_RACE_NO ,A.EX1 ,A.EX2 ,A.EX3 ,A.EX4 ,A.EX5 ,A.EX6 ,A.EX7 ,A.BUY_AMT ,A.PRT_CNT ,A.SLIP_STATUS ,A.RMK FROM TBRD_EVENT_7EX A ,TBRK_SPEC_CD B WHERE A.COMM_NO = B.CD AND B.GRP_CD = '060' AND A.EVENT_DT = ? AND A.CARD_NO LIKE '%'||? ORDER BY A.EVENT_DT, A.MIN_SLIP_SEQ

/* rsm1120_s02 */ UPDATE TBRD_EVENT_7EX SET PRT_CNT = PRT_CNT + 1 ,LAST_PRT_DT = SYSDATE ,SLIP_STATUS = DECODE(SLIP_STATUS,'001','002',SLIP_STATUS) ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE EVENT_DT = ? AND CARD_NO = ? AND CARD_SEQ = ?
